detail.keyMetricsSubtitle: Specific performance indicators of the project

zakyat-kz.title: ZAKYAT.KZ â€” Platform for Good Deeds
zakyat-kz.description: Independent online platform for targeted assistance, built on principles of trust, transparency and manual moderation. Enables people in need to directly connect with donors without intermediaries or money collection.
zakyat-kz.shortDescription: Platform for targeted assistance with manual moderation and transparency
zakyat-kz.imageAlt: ZAKYAT.KZ â€” Platform for targeted assistance
goals: Create a transparent platform for targeted assistance without intermediaries
Ensure manual moderation of all requests for safety
Eliminate money collection and third-party involvement
Implement filtering and randomization system for requests
tasks: Develop request submission system with data validation
Create moderation panel with access rights (moderator/administrator)
Implement public request catalog with filtering by district and assistance type
Configure request display randomization for fairness
Implement request status system (pending/verified/rejected/assistance received)
Create logging for all moderator actions
Implement spam protection (1 request per day per phone number)
Configure SEO optimization and contact protection from indexing
Develop Telegram bot for moderators (Phase 2)
Add "I helped" button with spam protection (Phase 2)
results: Launched platform with full request moderation cycle
Implemented role system with access rights separation
Deployed spam protection and automatic data validation
Created transparent catalog with filtering and randomization
Configured logging system for tracking all actions
Ensured contact security through robots.txt and noindex

amiray-kz.title: AMIRAY.KZ â€” Digital Agency Website
amiray-kz.description: Corporate website for a digital agency from Almaty. Built on Next.js/TypeScript stack with server-side rendering, animations and full responsiveness. Implemented service pages, portfolio and CRM integration.
amiray-kz.shortDescription: Corporate website for an IT agency on Next.js with animations and SSR
amiray-kz.imageAlt: AMIRAY.KZ â€” Digital Agency Corporate Website
goals: Build a modern corporate website with high loading speed
Implement service pages with detailed descriptions and pricing
Ensure SEO optimization to attract clients from search
Integrate contact form with the agency CRM system
tasks: Develop design system and component library
Implement server-side rendering (SSR) for key pages
Create animated sections using Framer Motion
Configure SEO metadata, structured data and sitemap
Integrate contact form with notification dispatch
Set up deployment via Docker/AWS with CI/CD pipeline
results: Site launched with Lighthouse Performance score 95+
Implemented 8+ service pages with detailed descriptions
SEO optimization configured for key search queries
First screen load time â€” under 1.5 seconds
Request system deployed with automated notifications

egemen-kz.title: EGEMEN.KZ â€” Media Platform Migration
egemen-kz.description: Full migration of the Kazak Gazetteri media holding platform from the legacy Laravel 5.8/PHP 7.1/MySQL stack to modern NestJS 11/Next.js/PostgreSQL 16/Docker. Zero data loss and continuous uptime ensured.
egemen-kz.shortDescription: News portal migration from Laravel/PHP to NestJS/Next.js for Kazak Gazetteri
egemen-kz.imageAlt: EGEMEN.KZ â€” Kazak Gazetteri Media Platform Migration
goals: Migrate from Laravel 5.8/PHP 7.1 to NestJS 11/Next.js with zero data loss
Move from MySQL to PostgreSQL 16 preserving all publication history
Implement Docker containerization for reliable deployment
Ensure SEO compatibility and preservation of search rankings
tasks: Audit existing Laravel architecture: routes, models, controllers
Develop MySQL â†’ PostgreSQL migration schema with data type mapping
Write NestJS modules to replace PHP controllers
Implement Next.js frontend with SSR for SEO
Configure 301 redirects to preserve SEO rankings
Dockerization: nginx + app + db + redis in docker-compose
Performance and load testing
results: Successful migration of 100% data without losses from MySQL to PostgreSQL
Loading speed improved by 60% compared to the Laravel version
SEO rankings preserved with correct 301 redirects
Deployment automated via Docker Compose and CI/CD
System runs on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS with zero downtime during updates

philosophy.title: Character & Thinking
philosophy.p1: I'm a systems thinker and strategist by nature. I'm interested in mechanisms â€” how processes, people, and structures work. I don't seek public visibility, but I care about influence â€” through the architecture of solutions, not words.
philosophy.p2: I don't believe in coincidences as magic. I believe in patterns and in the ability to build environments where the right outcomes become probable.
philosophy.p3: There's a stoic part of me â€” I try to maintain inner stability regardless of circumstances. I'm not prone to dramatizing and prefer analyzing reactions.
philosophy.p4: I'm not fully defined by labels and roles â€” and I consider that normal. I don't want to freeze into a ready-made identity. What matters to me is growth and depth of understanding.
philosophy.highlight1: My goal is not to be noticeable.
philosophy.highlight2: My goal is to be precise.
philosophy.p5: I value clarity, structure, independent thinking, and inner harmony. I work not for approval, but for the quality and durability of the result.
philosophy.p6: I don't control reality â€” I study its laws and try to act in accordance with them.

story.title: How I became a developer
story.p1: Before development, I worked in the quasiâ€‘public sector â€” at <kaz>Kazatomprom</kaz>, <alt>Altynalmas</alt> and <sk>Samrukâ€‘Kazyna</sk>. This was experience in large organizations with strict requirements and responsibility.
story.p2: Over time, I realized I wanted to do what brings measurable outcomes. I burned out from bureaucracy and processes that didnâ€™t help business. I decided to turn development into my main occupation â€” a hobby into a profession.
story.p3: This path taught me responsibility, work on large projects and how business processes should function in practice. Now every project is a tool to achieve goals.
story.p4: I work for results and value time and quality. Your project is an opportunity to create something that truly helps.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve site performance, analytics, and content personalization.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are usually set in response to your actions, such as setting privacy preferences, logging in, or filling out forms.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This allows us to improve site performance.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across different websites. The goal is to display relevant ads and encourage interest in products and services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when using our website. We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of information:

items.name: Name and contact information (when filling out forms)
items.usage: Website usage data (through cookies and analytics)

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve website functionality. You can manage cookie settings through the consent panel.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They provide basic functionality and security.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting information anonymously. This allows us to improve user experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track the effectiveness of advertising campaigns and personalize content.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use collected data for the following purposes:

items.communication: Communicating with you regarding your project
items.analytics: Analyzing website usage to improve service

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Data is stored on secure servers and transmitted through encrypted channels.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: In accordance with GDPR and other applicable laws, you have the right to:

items.portability: Receive a copy of your data in a structured format

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
